main event: A round object the size of a pen head was seen in Van Nuys, California for approximately 15 minutes.
interesting points: The object was stationary and disappeared extremely rapidly,The sighting lasted for 15 minutes,The witness described the disappearance as ominous,The observation was conducted in clear daylight,The document is a record from Project Blue Book.
sighted object: one round object, the size of a pen head
